exceptions.tactic: intros h d out d' l t HhandleTimeout Heq.

exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface cti : cronies_term_interface tsi : term_sanity_interface vci : votes_correct_interface cci : cronies_correct_interface h : name d : electionsData * raft_data out : list raft_output d' : raft_data l : list (name * msg) t : term msgs : list raft_output d'' : raft_data l0 : list (name * msg) H : (msgs, d'', l0) = (out, d', l) Heq_type : type (snd d) = Follower Unable to unify "cronies (fst d) t" with "cronies (update_elections_data_timeout h d) t".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface cti : cronies_term_interface tsi : term_sanity_interface vci : votes_correct_interface cci : cronies_correct_interface h : name d : electionsData * raft_data out : list raft_output d' : raft_data l : list (name * msg) t : term msgs : list raft_output d'' : raft_data l0 : list (name * msg) H : (msgs, d'', l0) = (out, d', l) Heq_type : type (snd d) = Candidate Unable to unify "votesReceived d'" with "cronies (update_elections_data_timeout h d) t".

original: intros h d out d' l t HhandleTimeout Heq. destruct (handleTimeout h (snd d)) as [[msgs d'']]. inversion HhandleTimeout; clear HhandleTimeout. unfold handleTimeout in Heq. destruct (type (snd d)) eqn:Heq_type; try discriminate. - left. reflexivity. - right. split. + symmetry in Heq. apply handleTimeout_not_leader_inc_term in Heq; auto. + split; auto.
